pages.title: Onyx Variant
pages.text: Upgrade your [Pigment Pedestal](book://general/pedestal) by using one of your [Onyx Shards](book://general/shards@onyx) to further increase its magical powers.

pages.title: Checklist (Complete)
pages.text: - 1 Pigment Pedestal\- 8 Polished Gemstone Blocks\- 8 Gemstone Lamps\- 4 Chiseled Polished Blocks\- 16 Gemstone Chiseled Blocks\- 16 Polished Crests\- 4 Notched Polished Blocks\- 36 Polished Pillars\- 160 Polished Blocks

pages.title: Checklist (Upgrade)
pages.text: - 4 Polished Gemstone Blocks\- 8 Gemstone Lamps\- 16 Gemstone Chiseled Blocks\- 16 Polished Crests\- 28 Polished Pillars\- 92 Polished Blocks
You can switch the basalt blocks with calcite and choose the gemstone blocks as you like it best. Mix up [#](bb00bb)Calcite[#]() and [#](bb00bb)Basalt[#]() up to create your personal variation!
